In the function "copyRange", the buffer size "input" is fixed.

Based on the bug Apache 32546 and the experiment, a appropriate buffer size based on the length of the inputstream can help improve the performance a lot.
creator: xiaoming@cs.wisc.edu
markt@apache.org
text:
It isn't quite that simple. There are a number of other factors in play here such as the use of sendfile and the configuration of the static resource cache. Also, the size of both the input buffer and output buffer are already configurable.

Without a use case that doesn't perform very well and can't easily be tuned with the current options, this is going to get resolved as WONTFIX.
No use case provided, so closing as per previous comment.
creator: markt@apache.org
